text:
Cases were filed against two persons – Seelapadi panchayat president Karnan and AIADMK party functionary Selvaraj of Mettukadai – in connection with the seizure of sari bundles from a private mill on Nandhavanapatti Road at Chettinaickanpatti village near here on Tuesday.

A special flying squad seized 2,315 saris worth Rs.9.38 lakh from a private spinning mill owned by an AIADMK party functionary and Seelapadi panchayat president Karnan on Monday evening.
title: Cases filed
